content: Savings Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 06 Sep 2019Achieving 100k at age 21?Turning 21 in a month! and I'm proud to share that I've got $95,000k as part of my portfolio:) Wanted to hit 100k by 21st birthday but well fell short slightly! All I can say is hard work is a huge contributing factor!4 answersAnswerBump0

Grand MasterAnswered on 12 Sep 2019Congrats on the first pot of gold.1st pot of gold is the hardest.The 2nd pot is much easier. and then you will realise the 3rd pot is damn big and you may lose your 1st pot if you go for it.GO FOR IT. be hungry. be foolish ;)0 comments1
